name: Scram (itch) (Pranay Ramteke)
description:
An Endless Runner; A phantom's escape

A simple endless runner game where the player controls a phantom to aid in his escape. Beware! The phantom has finite lives, so make your moves count!

Use Up and Down arrow keys for movement and 'R' to Restart

A project by Pranay Ramteke

Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/pranayramteke/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/TYL5E
